documentation.text:
@notice Returns the version of the token contract
 @return TOKEN_VERSION {string} version of the smart contract

@notice Returns the address wallet of the smart contract owner.
 @return owner {address} wallet addres from owner

@notice Transfer ownership of the smart contract
 @param account {address} address of the new owner

@notice Get request to by owner
 @return request {string, uint256, uint256, uint256} (messageRequest, amountRequest, acceptedRequest, refusedRequest)

params.from: {address} the origin of the token transfer
params.to: {address} the recipient of the token transfer

returns._0: request {string, uint256, uint256, uint256} (messageRequest, amountRequest, acceptedRequest, refusedRequest)

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfer and send `amount` tokens from `_msgSender()` to `to` Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer and send `amount` tokens from `from` to `to` Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

returns._0: TOKEN_VERSION {string} version of the smart contract

params.amount: {uint256} amount of vote request, need to be lower than balance of shareholder

params.receiver: {address} the recipient of the token transfer

burn(address,uint256).notice: Remove `amount` tokens from `account` Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

canTransfer(address,address,address,uint.notice: Interface of transfer method, return hex code error message

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mint and send `amount` tokens to `to` Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

owner().notice: Returns the address wallet of the smart contract owner.

refoundable(uint256).notice: Return amount of refoundable for amount of tokens burned

setRequest(string,uint256).notice: Owner request (and request for withdraw if _rules.voteToWithdraw == true) with a comment and amount (Request can't be equal to last request and set request restart all votes)

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership of the smart contract

version().notice: Returns the version of the token contract

voteToRequest(bool,uint256).notice: Shareholder vote to the request of owner

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw tokens amount of contract balance
